name: Fringe pod, Ribbed fringepod, Showy fringe pod
overview: The ribbed fringepod is an annual flowering plant under the mustard family. This fruit has a flat wing around it and is ribbed with purple rays like the spokes of a wheel. This is one of its distinguishing characteristics.
habitat: Native to northern and central California and Oregon. Prefers moist meadows, fields and hillsides.
tags:
